alert.note: Alert for Santa Barbara County Interior Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued September 26 at 2:15PM PDT until September 27 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM PDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * WHERE...Santa Barbara County Interior Mountains. * WHEN...Until 5 AM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...These strong winds will combine with a dry air mass to create elevated to potentially critical fire weather conditions.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
